column4: what's a good program to browse and download usenet binaries?
klibido works good too.. I've experienced memory problems with pan.
- ok, i have a older pc, PIII 1ghz 512mb ram

reason I say that is.. you mentioned binaries.. most binary groups have huge amounts of articles in them.. pan will use up all your ram and crash after about 1 million headers.. klibido doesn't seem to have that problem.
